description:
At the Robin J Peterson Co, LLC, in Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio, you will find workers' compensation attorneys who take your work-related injury as seriously as you do. Because workers' compensation and personal injury law are all we practice, we know what we are doing and we do it exceedingly well. So, whether you reside in the Akron, Canton or Cleveland metro area or anywhere in Cuyahoga, Lake, Lorain, Medina, Portage or Stark counties, rest assured that our law firm has successfully represented injured workers for over 20 years.

We know how devastating a work-related injury can be for you. Not only do you require medical and hospital care, but may also require to take time off work, thus losing wages for a substantial period of time while recovering. This is where our law firm comes in. We take on the attorneys of the Ohio Bureau of Workers' Compensation, the self-insured employers and the managed care organizations for you so you can concentrate on getting well.

Our law firm's goal is to get you the medical attention you need, plus the maximum compensation to which Ohio law entitles you. Sometimes this includes compensation over and above than what workers' compensation covers, especially if you sustain one of the following types of injury:

  • Traumatic brain injury
  • Spinal cord injury
  • Loss of limb injury
  • Loss of vision injury
  • Loss of hearing injury

Robin J Peterson Co, LLC, offers free initial consultations and virtual appointments. In addition, we accept all major credit cards.
